name: Uizuno Blade
summary: Uizuno Blade is an action Sci-Fi game designed for Virtual Reality. Fight with laser guns and energy swords against hostile soldiers and monsters. This early release version contains four fully playable levels of action and will be updated with more levels in the coming months.

name: Uin
summary:
One day, a young boy sees his brother walk inside of the cupboard, warning him not to follow him. He doesn't listen, only to find himself in a strange world full of monsters and no way to go back home.

What is this place? What is your brother hiding? And what is your family's dark secret?

name: UIFO Defense HD
summary: UIFO Defense has a special gameplay of tower defense. Utilize the terrain and different turrets to eliminate alien invaders and protect the crystal cores which are critical to science and technology of your civilization.

name: UIM
summary: A 3D trading and combat game, UIM is reminiscent of Elite, but the action takes place underwater rather than in space.
